    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Forces that make things move</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte, die Sachen bilden, bewegen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les forces qui font des choses se déplacent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As forças que fazem coisas movem-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le forze che fanno le cose si muovono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις που κάνουν τα πράγματα να κινηθούν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las fuerzas que hacen cosas se mueven</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations showing forces that make things move. A bigger pushing force makes the buggy move faster.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">buggy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pull</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Push</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei darstellenden 
Abbildungen bewegen Kräfte, die Sachen bilden. Eine grössere 
drückenkraft trifft die Buggymaßnahme schneller.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de trois illustrations montrant les
forces qui font des choses se déplacent. Une plus grande force 
de poussée rend le mouvement de boguet plus rapide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações que mostram as 
forças que fazem coisas movem-se. Uma força empurrando mais 
grande faz o movimento do buggy mais rápido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni che 
mostrano le forze che fanno le cose si muovono. Una forza di 
spinta più grande rende il movimento del buggy più veloce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν δυνάμεις 
που κάνουν τα πράγματα να κινηθούν. Μια μεγαλύτερη δύναμη 
ώθησης καθιστά τη με λάθη κίνηση γρηγορότερη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones que 
muestran las fuerzas que hacen cosas se mueven. Una fuerza que 
empuja más grande hace el movimiento del cochecillo más rápido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Buggy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
